name: Alone In Space (itch) (ScienceJ)
description:
Space Survival... Can you cut it?

You are a mining ship who got left behind when other factions appeared in your space zone. No you have one option... Escape...

PLEASE NOTE! 

This was a game jam submission and is NOT complete. You can play the 3 training levels provided.

Please leave a comment and/or rating if you would like to see this project be completed.
